questions.question: Hey, send me to the time management submodule!
questions.answer: If you are interested in learning more about time management, you can visit this link: https://moodle.hm.edu/course/view.php?id=20194#coursecontentcollapse5. Would you like to know more details about a specific aspect of time management?

questions.question: How to be more effective
questions.answer: If you want to improve your effectiveness, you can explore strategies and tips in the "Self-Motivation 2: How to Find Out What I Really Want" section. You can access it through this link: https://moodle.hm.edu/course/view.php?id=20194#coursecontentcollapse2. Is there a specific area of effectiveness you would like to focus on?
